name: forbear
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
to prevent yourself from saying or doing something, especially in a way that shows control, good judgment, or kindness to others: forbear from His plan was such a success that even his original critics could scarcely forbear from congratulating him.forbear to The doctor said she was optimistic about the outcome of the operation but forbore to make any promises at this early stage.
